issue.title: [Python] test_parquet.py regression with Pandas 0.23.0
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
See e.g. https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/379652352#L3124.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2589?focusedCommentId=16477427) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
It is most likely a regression in Pandas actually:
https://github.com/pandas-dev/pandas/issues/21083
